column1: echo ¦echo¦"Installing Golang 1.4" && cd /tmp && curl -O https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.4.2.src.tar.gz && echo '460caac03379f746c473814a65223397e9c9a2f6 go1.4.2.src.tar.gz' | sha1sum -c && tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.4.2.src.tar.gz && ... :: Filesystem_operation

echo ¦echo¦"Configure environment" && mkdir -p /go/src /go/bin && chmod -R 777 /go && echo export GOROOT=${GOROOT} > /etc/profile.d/golang.sh && echo export GOPATH=${GOPATH} >> /etc/profile.d/golang.sh && echo export PATH=\\${PATH}:\\${GOROOT}/bin... :: Filesystem_operation
